ai-thig6.5:1.1_0: I was born into an eminent family,
ai-thig6.5:1.3_0: endowed with a beautiful complexion and figure;
ai-thig6.5:2.2_0: coveted by sons of the wealthy.
ai-thig6.5:2.3_0: One sent a messenger to my father:
ai-thig6.5:3.3_0: I'll give you eight times that
ai-thig6.5:4.1_0: When I saw the Awakened One,
ai-thig6.5:4.3_0: He paid homage at his feet,
ai-thig6.5:4.4_0: then sat down to one side.
ai-thig6.5:6.1_0: Then, having cut off my hair,
ai-thig6.5:6.2_0: then he went forth to homelessness.
ai-thig6.5:6.3_0: Now it is the seventh night
